title: Trump rebrands signature legislation amid poor polling
shortDescription: Trump said he’s no longer referring to the new law as the One Big Beautiful Bill. The law’s title isn’t helping with the sales pitch, Trump said.

title: Trump seeks death penalty for DC murders
shortDescription: President Donald Trump announced his administration will seek the death penalty for D.C. murders.

title: Kill someone in nation's capital? President Trump wants death penalty.
shortDescription: Trump made the remark at his Cabinet meeting. It is likely to ratchet up the already heated national debate about capital punishment.

title: John Bolton rips Donald Trump days after FBI search of home and office
shortDescription: Former National Security Adviser John Bolton is back to criticizing President Donald Trump following last week's FBI search of his home and office.

title: Trump accused Fed's Lisa Cook of mortgage fraud. She's not the first.
shortDescription: Trump's attempt to oust the Fed's Governor is over accusations Cook made false statements on mortgage agreements. It's an accusation he's made before.

title: Trump's firing of Lisa Cook hinges on one thing: his reason why
shortDescription: Trump said he fired Fed governor Lisa Cook but legal experts say he hasn't justified the removal she vowed to fight from the independent board.

title: Trump DOJ loses lawsuit against Maryland judges over deportations
shortDescription: A Trump-appointed judge threw out a rare lawsuit brought by the administration against Maryland judges to block judicial orders on deportations.

title: Trump, Gov. Pritzker fight over Chicago. Will he deploy National Guard?
shortDescription: President Donald Trump has said Chicago would be the next city to send the National Guard to. Gov. Pritzker said they aren't welcome. What to know.

title: Trump says Cracker Barrel should return to old logo
shortDescription: President Donald Trump jumped into the Cracker Barrel controversy, saying the company should "admit a mistake" and return to its old logo.

title: Trump threatens to send troops into Chicago. Gov. Pritzker fires back.
shortDescription: In speech, Pritzker says Trump won't improve Chicago's safety by sending in National Guard. Instead, he says the president is 'defunding the police.'

title: Man arrested outside White House for burning American flag
shortDescription: The Secret Service said it detained a person Aug. 25 for "igniting an object" near the White House, which news outlets reported as an American flag.

title: Trump targets Fed Governor Lisa Cook
shortDescription: President Donald Trump says he has "sufficient cause" to fire Fed Governor Lisa Cook over mortgage fraud claims.

title: New helipad planned for President Trump's Mar-a-Lago estate
shortDescription: With a larger helicopter being used as Marine One, a proposed reconstructed helipad at Mar-a-Lago must be larger as well, plans show.

title: Jeanine Pirro flipped on Fox, flopped under oath in election suit
shortDescription: In court depositions, the now-US attorney for Washington, DC said Smartmatic didn't rig the election for Biden, despite her claims as Fox News host.

title: Trump wants to bring back Department of War
shortDescription: "We want to be offensive, too." President Trump suggests renaming Department of Defense to its previous title of the Department of War.

title: Trump fires Federal Reserve Governor Lisa Cook
shortDescription: "I have determined that there is sufficient cause to remove you from your position," Trump said in a letter to Cook posted on Truth Social.

title: Pritzker rejects Trump’s troop threat
shortDescription: Gov. JB Pritzker pushes back on Trump’s threat to deploy military to Chicago, calling it dangerous and unnecessary.

title: Jailed trucker puts spotlight on Trump immigration policy
shortDescription: An Indian trucker, in the US illegally, is accused of causing a fatal accident in Florida. Now the Trump administration is cracking down on all immigrant truckers.

title: Trump wants a Department of War: 'We want to be offensive, too'
shortDescription: President Donald Trump brushed aside any concerns about Congress not going along with his plans. “We’re just going to do it,” he said.

title: See Trump's use of American flag symbolism in photos
shortDescription: Trump has often employed the symbolism of the American flag throughout his political career. On Aug. 25, he moved to penalize those who burn it.

title: FEMA staff tell Congress Trump officials risk Katrina-level disaster
shortDescription: The letter signed by 35 named employees said Homeland Security Secretary Kristi Noem and acting FEMA director David Richardson lack qualifications.

title: House committee wants Epstein 'birthday book' with alleged Trump message
shortDescription: President Donald Trump sued the Wall Street Journal after it reported on a bawdy birthday greeting the paper said he had made for Jeffery Epstein.

title: Trump pushes DC National Guard into bigger public safety role
shortDescription: Trump rejected allegations that his use of the National Guard in Los Angeles and Washington, DC, was an abuse of power. "I'm not a dictator," he said.

title: Trump calls Chris Christie ‘a slob’ as Hudson River feud persists
shortDescription: Trump called former New Jersey Gov. Chris Christie 'a slob' but stopped short of saying he should be criminally investigated.
